article_title: Trump And Other GOP Candidates Want To 'Fix' ObamaCare By Making It Do Something It Already Does

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Amid the food fight that was the 10th Republican presidential debate, there was much talk among candidates about the need for paying for quality when it comes to healthcare even as they want to gut the Affordable Care Act. But the health law the GOP candidates say they want to repeal [...]
